title: VYNL Bikes Relaunches: New Ownership, plus new Road and Gravel Disc frames
content:
After a year-long hiatus, Boulder, CO’s VYNL Bikes is back. New ownership seeks to revive the company by adding two new frame designs but maintains the brand’s characteristic stripped-down approach. Ownership is also intent on keeping the company entirely U.S.-based, from fabrication to delivery. Road and gravel disc frames join the original road rim design […]

The post VYNL Bikes Relaunches: New Ownership, plus new Road and Gravel Disc frames appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
